title: Price of loaf of bread increased by Rs.30/-
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The price of a loaf of bread has been increased by Rs. 30/- from tonight (19), says the Bakery Owners Association of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, a loaf of bread will cost Rs. 170/- from tonight, while the prices of other bakery items will be increased according to the respective bakery rates, the association added.
47-year-old male injured during assault near Beire Lake on 9th May, dies.
Sri Lanka stops issuing fuel to MPs from Police filling station
